001package org.nasdanika.exec.gen;
002
003import java.io.InputStream;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl;
006import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
007import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
008import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
009import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
010import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
011import org.nasdanika.exec.Fail;
012
013public class FailSupplierFactoryAdapter extends AdapterImpl implements SupplierFactory<InputStream> {
014        
015        public FailSupplierFactoryAdapter(Fail fail) {
016                setTarget(fail);
017        }
018        
019        @Override
020        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
021                return type == SupplierFactory.class;
022        }
023
024        @Override
025        public Supplier<InputStream> create(Context context) {
026                String message = context.interpolateToString(((Fail) getTarget()).getMessage());
027                
028                return new Supplier<InputStream>() {
029
030                        @Override
031                        public double size() {
032                                return 1;
033                        }
034
035                        @Override
036                        public String name() {
037                                return "[Fail] " + message;
038                        }
039
040                        @Override
041                        public InputStream execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
042                                throw new ExecutionException(message, this);
043                        }
044                };
045        }
046        
047        
048
049}
